name: $named-event
desc: The trigger occurs at a specific time or periodically as described by a timing or schedule

name: $periodic
desc: The trigger occurs whenever data of a particular type is added

name: $data-added
desc: The trigger occurs whenever data of a particular type is modified

name: $data-modified
desc: The trigger occurs whenever data of a particular type is removed

name: $data-removed
desc: The trigger occurs whenever data of a particular type is accessed

name: $data-accessed
desc: The trigger occurs whenever access to data of a particular type is completed
